评论详情: Love the loose fit and so comfortable!

I thought this was an excellent quality for the money. It's super cute and I'm able to wear it during the winter and I'm actually too warm inside. I am 5'8 150 lb and I got a medium and it fit kind of bulky. But once I washed it and dried it it was a perfect size. I definitely will be getting another one.
I bought this set in Navy and after the first wash. It turned out the pants are not the same deep navy as the top.

This is exactly what I hoped for and expected from reading the description and reviews. Im 5' 6" and 130 lbs and ordered small. I think the pants are just long enough, so if you're any taller i feel like they would be short. It is an oversized fit but in a cute way not sloppy. The material is a nice midweight 50/50 cotton and polyester so it's soft but sturdy and breathable but warm. I've washed and dried them and they did shrink but just by a tiny bit. I like them so much I'm ordering a second pair in a different color!
Love love love. So comfortable and warm. I’m 5’3” and my only issue is the pants come above my ankles. I get so many compliments. I am going to by more!!!

I don’t seem to have much luck with Amazon clothing purchases but I gambled on this and won. Ordered S. I’m not quite 5’4 and 136#. Perfect amount of baggy in the pants. Already washed and still looks good. Does pick up lint. I like the black zipper.

I am more than pleasantly surprised how nice the set is. Good quality material, inside is super soft and it held up super well on the first wash. I was worried the pants were going to be too short but they are long enough - I’m 5’9”. I will probably order this in another color!
This outfit is so warm. The material is great. I wash this and it did not shrink and the inside still stayed soft.

Super soft. Washes well. Pants are bigger than I’d hope but keeps me really warm in the winter for outdoor events and they are so cozy you won’t want to take them off. I wear the top with leggings by itself a lot too. In love!
This set is absolutely great it's super comfortable and it's the perfect amount of baggy so it's cozy but also doesn't make you look homeless and still presentable in public.

Purchased this to wear during a recent trip. Not only did it keep me warm but it was very comfortable. The set is kinda baggy so if that’s not the style you want definitely size down. For reference I am 5’4, 153 lbs and I got a size medium. If I purchase again I would go with a small.

评论概述: Buy it, its the perfect sweatsuit
评论详情: I now have this in multiple colors. I wear it weekly if not more! I get compliments on it everything too! Its the perfect fit + holds up to washes well.

On day one of wearing it, water from my water bottle dripped on to the top and ever since it has had a stain on it. I washed it hoping that would help but more dots were created all over it and the bottoms. Its no longer wearable or ill look like a slob. Go for a way darker color if this concerns you. Also, wash it a few times otherwise you will be covered in fluff. It sheds a lot.

The material is so soft and comfortable. I am 4'11 and the sweatpants are a nice baggy fit. I bring the pants up a bit so its more high waist and the legs perfectly slouch at my feet. I got a small for reference.

Nice thickness and warmth. True to size and washes well. I would size up for a baggier look. My mom is a size medium in women and this set fits her perfectly.  For reference she’s 106lbs and about 5’4”.
This outfit is so comfortable and baggy I love the material it’s thick and so soft on the inside!

I love the idea of a comfy set. This is a very basic  slightly oversized set. Good for moments when you want to throw on something big, comfy, and slightly warm. Down side, it's made very cheaply. My whole entire apartment is covered in black fluff. The inside is shedding like my Pomeranian dog even AFTER a wash. I would buy this maybe for a man of 20-30$ total.
The best value and look. So smooth and the quality is on point! Will purchase more in different colors!
My teenage girls loved these sweatsuuts! Very comfortable, not to heavy, and great value for the cost. Sizing was accurate.

So I received a size down - but it fits perfectly. Definitely less "oversized" because it's a size down, but as a plump girl, sometimes the oversized look isn't quite right. ANYWAY, the color on this is STUNNING (I got the bluegreen color and if you are a soft summer, this color is everything). The elastic on the pants are not too tight, the pullover hits right at the waist, and as a long-limbed person, the sleeves and legs are fine. I would love this set in another color, with a hood!
Love the style and fit of this. Material is soft and thick! Did not lack or disappoint! Very true to fit. I wear mostly a large. This is a large. Definitely a five star for me! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

I love this set! Super comfy and the quality is much better than I expected. It has a slightly oversized fit so I ordered my typical size and it fits just how I wanted. I will likely order in another color!

评论详情: Looks good, but the material is extremely stiff and has very little stretch. Hardly something for lounging. Would not buy again.
Purchased what they said was a red color but was more of a dull burgundy

I like the sweatsuit very much for the great color and wonderful warmth on cold days. The black zipper is a nice feature. Medium is my usual size and it is roomy and comfortable except for the waistband on the pants. It is wide and about 2” too tight to be really comfortable. I had to do a bit of cutting with small scissors to loosen the elastic to make it completely comfortable. I have washed it once on gentle setting in cold water and I put them in a small mesh bag that I use for delicates or items likely to leave lint. The top and pants both came out of the washer fine. There was a little lint left in the mesh bag. Dried them on lowest setting until about half dry then put them on hangers until dry. No shrinkage and the minor wrinkles hung out as they dried. Now it looks great and fits well.
This set is of great quality, washes well and stays soft.

评论概述: Too bulky not soft after washing
评论详情: This was so great when I first got it but now it’s annoying. It does not shrink at all after washing and drying but produces so much fuzz and now it’s stiff. The top is supposed to be loose and cozy but it’s just too much, if it were soft, it would drape. If the collar is zipped it’s pushing into my face, if it’s unzipped it’s not so warm. I’ll probably take the top to GoodWill and just keep the pants, you can always use sweat pants. I’m 5’5” 130lbs and got a medium. I don’t think a smaller size would help.

I love how comfortable this set fills. I’m usually a large, but ordered a medium and it fits perfect!!

Love this set so much! I’m normally a large and that’s what I ordered in light grey. I wish the pants were a little larger and the top a little smaller but it works! 评论概述: Cute set but for taller girls
评论详情: I’m not sure if it’s because I’m on the shorter side, but everything fit great except the bottoms. The material is pretty good-really thick fabric, and the color doesn’t fade. But the bottoms of the pants have way too much fabric for my liking. Other than that, it’s a nice set.
These were bulkier than anticipated from the pictures. They size seemed to fit well in height and waist, but I felt swallowed up in them. The color was true to the photos.
Super comfortable definitely want one in every color!!
The picture in the advertisement shows sweatpants without a visible drawstring, but the ones I received have it visible. How is that possible? - I'll return it.
Was too thick for what I was looking for.

Was very surprised with such a great quality sweat set. Came with both top and bottom. Just the top alone would cost that amount, but it came as a set. Love it. Very comfortable and stylish. My husband loved it on me. I'm going to buy a couple more in different colors. Definitely would recommend.

I love this sweatsuit. I ordered a small according to the size chart however it was too small. I returned it and ordered a medium and it’s perfect. The material is soft on the inside and outside. It washed nicely. It’s thick but in a nice way. I’m very happy with this purchase.

I absolutely I love this set! I’m really hoping they do not shrink in the wash like my last Amazon set (not this brand). One happy surprise is the pockets are lined! The quality is great and would make a great gift! I got a medium and I’m usually a medium and fits a perfectly oversized. If u want a tighter fit, size down one.

评论概述: Oh no, I love them too much
评论详情: It was recommended for me to get an XL, but after reading reviews I decided to go with a medium and I'm glad I did because though it was a tiny bit slim-fitting, it made it so that it wasn't overly baggy. I went with gray because it's just a classic sweatsuit color and it came exactly as I wanted. The material is a decent thickness, with the inside being super soft. It's much better quality than some other sets I've gotten recently. This set is perfect for running a few errands in the autumn or staying in.  11/25/24 update I've ordered the set in 2 more colors. These are the most comfortable clothing I've ever had. The coordinated style uplifts the look. My favorite color is still the light grey.
The pants swallowed me! The top was great!
